level.text: Mayor’s Orders, previously issued as Commissioner’s Orders until 1975, and before that as Commissioners’ Orders until November 1967, and Orders of the Commissioners until May 1971, are incorporated in this chapter by reference.
Orders are of many types and relate to the following:
Appointments to various boards, commissions, and committees;
Organization and reorganization of the District government;
Adoption, amendment, and repeal of rules and regulations; and
Other related matters as required by law or custom.
Orders shall be bound each year in hard covers, and each volume shall contain a subject index.
Orders date from 1871, and copies of these orders shall be available upon request at the Office of Documents and Administrative Issuances.
